results.name: Abundance
results.text:
[[main]] - [[exhaust]]: All players may draw up to 2 cards. For each card they cannot or do not draw, deal 1 damage to their Phoenixborn.

Focus 1: Reduce the damage your Phoenixborn receives from this spell by 1.

Focus 2: Reduce the damage your Phoenixborn receives from this spell by an additional 1.

results.name: Accelerate
results.text: Draw 1 card. Change 2 dice in your active pool to a side of your choice. You may take up to 2 additional side actions this turn.

results.name: Admonisher
results.text: Rebuke 1: At the end of each round, deal 1 damage to a target Phoenixborn.

results.name: Adrenaline Rush
results.text: Deal 1 damage to a target unit you control. Remove 1 exhaustion token from that unit.

results.name: Amplify
results.text: Choose a target unit you control with an attack value of 0. Add 3 to its attack value for the remainder of the turn.

results.name: Ancestor Spirit
results.text: Guidance: When this unit comes into play, you may draw 1 card. If you do, place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of your draw pile.

results.name: Ancestral Army
results.text: Invoke Ancestors: When this unit comes into play, place 2 [[Ancestor Spirit]] conjurations onto your battlefield.

results.name: Anchornaut
results.text: Throw 1: When this unit comes into play, you may deal 1 damage to another target unit.

results.name: Angelic Rescue
results.text: You may play this spell after a unit you control is dealt damage by a spell, ability, or dice power an opponent controls. Prevent that damage from being received, and then remove all wound tokens from that unit.

results.name: Anguish
results.text: Choose a target Phoenixborn. Its controlling player may discard 1 card at random from their hand. If they do not or cannot, place 2 wound tokens on that Phoenixborn. Then choose a target Phoenixborn. Its controlling player may move 2 dice of your choice from their active pool to their exhausted pool. If they do not or cannot, place 2 wound tokens on that Phoenixborn.

results.name: Aradel Summergaard
results.text: Water Blast: [[side]] - [[exhaust]] - 1 [[natural:class]]: Deal 2 damage to a target unit.

results.name: Archasaurus Mount
results.text:
Gigantic 2: This unit cannot be blocked or guarded against by units with a life value of 2 or less.

* Dismount: When this unit is destroyed, place any allies you own underneath this unit into your hand.

results.name: Ash Spirit
results.text:
To Ash: After this unit is destroyed as a result of an attack from a unit an opponent controls, destroy that target unit.

Smolder 1: At the end of the round, deal 1 damage to a target Phoenixborn whose owner has no cards in their draw pile.

results.name: Astrea
results.text: Beguile: [[main]] - [[exhaust]] - 1 [[basic]]: Place 1 exhaustion token on a target unexhausted unit.

results.name: Augury
results.text:
When this spell comes into play, place 3 status tokens on it.

[[side]] - [[exhaust]]: Search your draw pile. You may reveal 1 card with a magic play cost of X and place it into your hand. If you do, remove 1 status token from this spell. Shuffle your draw pile.

X = the number of status tokens on this spell.

results.name: Backtrack
results.text: You may play this spell after an opponent declares attackers. Choose a target attacking ally and place it into its owner's hand.

results.name: Battle Seer
results.text:
Quick Strike: While this unit is attacking, it deals its damage before units in battle with it.

Alert: Do not place exhaustion tokens on this unit as a result of its countering.

results.name: Beast Mage
results.text:
Terrifying 1: This unit cannot be blocked or guarded against by units with an attack value of 1 or less.

* Transform 2: While you do not have the first player token, the attack value, life value, and recover value of this unit are increased by 2.

results.name: Beast Tamer
results.text:
Tame 1: While this unit is in battle, the attack value of units in battle with it is reduced by 1.

Alert: Do not place exhaustion tokens on this unit as a result of its countering.

results.name: Beast Warrior
results.text:
Group Tactics 1: After you declare 3 or more attackers, you may add 1 to this unit's attack value for the remainder of this turn.

* Transform 1: While you do not have the first player token, the attack value, life value, and recover value of this unit are increased by 1

results.name: Biter
results.text:
Unit Guard: This unit may guard a unit that is being attacked.

Rooted: This unit cannot attack.

results.name: Blackcloud Ninja
results.text: Seal Strike 1: When this unit is declared as an attacker, you may choose a target opponent to place 1 exhaustion token on an unexhausted ready spell of their choice that they control.

results.name: Blink
results.text: Remove a target unit from the game. At the end of this turn, place that unit onto its owner's battlefield.

results.name: Blood Archer
results.text: Blood Shot: [[side]]: Place 1 wound token on this unit to deal 1 damage to a target unit.

results.name: Blood Chains
results.text: Destroy a unit you control to place 1 exhaustion token on a target unit. If the destroyed unit had 1 or more wound tokens on it, place 2 exhaustion tokens instead.

results.name: Blood Puppet
results.text:
Cursed 1: At the end of each round, place 1 wound token on your Phoenixborn.

Self Inflict 1: [[side]] - 1 [[basic]]: Deal 1 damage to this unit.

results.name: Blood Shaman
results.text: * Blood Ritual 1: When this unit is destroyed as a result of a spell, ability, or dice power you control, you may remove 1 wound token from your Phoenixborn and then raise 1 die in your active pool one level.

results.name: Blood Transfer
results.text: [[side]] - [[exhaust]] - 1 [[charm:class]] - 1 [[ceremonial:class]]: Deal 2 damage to a target unit you control. If you do, you may remove 2 wound tokens from another unit you control or remove 1 wound token from your Phoenixborn.

results.name: Blue Jaguar
results.text: Gaze: When this unit is declared as an attacker, you may choose a target unit an opponent controls. That unit cannot block or guard for the remainder of the turn.

results.name: Body Inversion
results.text: [[side]] - [[exhaust]] - 1 [[illusion:class]]: Swap a target unit's printed attack value with its printed life value for the remainder of the turn.

results.name: Bound Soul
results.text: Search your discard pile for an ally and place it into your hand.

results.name: Brennen Blackcloud
results.text: Spirit Burn: [[side]] - [[exhaust]] - 1 [[ceremonial:class]]: Destroy a unit you control to deal 2 damage to a target Phoenixborn.

results.name: Brilliant Thorn
results.text:
* Inheritance 1: When this unit is destroyed, you may place 1 status token on a target unit.

* Fade: Destroy this unit at the end of this round.

results.name: Butterfly Monk
results.text:
Unit Guard: This unit may guard a unit that is being attacked.

* Mend 1: When this unit is destroyed, you may remove 1 wound token from a target unit or Phoenixborn.

results.name: Call To Action
results.text: You may play this spell after an opponent declares attackers. Remove 1 exhaustion token from a target unit you control.

results.name: Call Upon The Realms
results.text: Change 3 dice in your active pool to a side of your choice.

results.name: Canyon Shelter
results.text:
[[side]] - [[exhaust]]: Remove an exhausted unit you control from play and place it face down under this spell.

[[main]] - 1 [[time:class]]: Choose a unit underneath this spell and place it onto your battlefield. Place 1 status token on that unit.

results.name: Captivate
results.text:
When this spell comes into play, you may destroy a target exhausted unit with a charm die on it.

[[side]] - [[exhaust]]: Choose a target unit. That unit cannot be declared as an attacker until the start of your next turn or the next round.

results.name: Celestial Knight
results.text: * Armored 1: After this unit is dealt damage, prevent 1 damage from being received.

results.name: Cerasaurus Mount
results.text:
Overkill 1: After this unit destroys a unit an opponent controls by attacking, deal 1 damage to that opponent's target Phoenixborn.

* Dismount: When this unit is destroyed, place any allies you own underneath this unit into your hand.

results.name: Chained Creations
results.text: Deal 2 damage to a target conjuration an opponent controls. If that destroys the conjuration, after it is destroyed, place 1 exhaustion token on a ready spell that target opponent controls that has a printed effect that can place that conjuration onto the battlefield.

results.name: Change Psyche
results.text: Remove 1 exhaustion token from a target unit or place 1 exhaustion token on a target unit.

results.name: Changing Winds
results.text:
When this spell comes into play, you may draw 2 cards. If you do, choose 2 cards in your hand and place each one on the top or bottom of your draw pile.

[[side]] - [[exhaust]]: Draw 1 card. Change 1 die in your active pool to a side of your choice.

results.name: Chant of Revenge
results.text:
After an ally you control is destroyed, place 1 status token on this spell if it has no status tokens on it.

[[side]] - [[exhaust]]: Remove 1 status token from this spell to deal 1 damage to a target Phoenixborn.

results.name: Chant Of Sacrifice
results.text: [[side]] - [[exhaust]]: Destroy a unit you control.

results.name: Chant of Worship
results.text:
After an ally you control is destroyed, place 1 status token on this spell if it has no status tokens on it.

[[main]] - [[exhaust]]: Remove 1 status token from this spell to draw 1 card.

results.name: Chaos Gravity
results.text: Place 1 exhaustion token on a target unit. Move 1 exhaustion token from a target unit to another unit controlled by the same player. Remove 1 exhaustion token from a target unit.

results.name: Choke
results.text: Place 1 exhaustion token on a target unexhausted Phoenixborn an opponent controls. Deal 1 damage to that target Phoenixborn.

results.name: Close Combat
results.text: Choose an unexhausted unit you control. Deal damage to another target unit equal to the chosen unit's attack value. Then, place 1 wound token or 1 exhaustion token on the chosen unit you control.

results.name: Coal Roarkwin
results.text: Slash: [[side]] - 1 [[discard]]: Choose a player. Deal 1 damage to a target unit they control, or deal 1 damage to their target Phoenixborn if they control no units.

results.name: Concentration
results.text:
[[main]] or [[side]] - [[exhaust]] - 2 [[basic]]: Place 1 status token on your Phoenixborn. Draw 1 card. Choose 1 die in your exhausted pool and place it into your active pool on a side of your choice.

Focus 1: Then, if there are 7 or more status tokens on your Phoenixborn, attach [[The Awakened State]] conjured alteration spell to it.

results.name: Confusion Spores
results.text:
[[side]] - [[exhaust]]: Target unit cannot block or guard for the remainder of this turn.

Focus 1: You may spend an additional 1 [[sympathy:class]] to take 1 additional side action this turn.

results.name: Consume Soul
results.text: You may play this spell after a unit an opponent controls is destroyed as a result of an attack you control. Remove 2 wound tokens and 1 exhaustion token from your Phoenixborn.

results.name: Copycat
results.text: You may play this spell after an opponent resolves an action spell or activated Phoenixborn ability. Resolve a copy of that spell or ability without paying its play cost or activation cost.

results.name: Cover
results.text: You may play this spell after your Phoenixborn, while guarding, is dealt damage by a unit's attack. Prevent that damage from being received. Deal 1 damage to the target attacking unit.

results.name: Crescendo
results.text: You may play this spell after you have declared attackers. Deal 1 damage to a target unit you control to deal 3 damage to a target unit.

results.name: Crimson Bomber
results.text: Detonate 3: [[side]]: Destroy this unit to place 1 wound token on up to 3 target units.

results.name: Crystal Shield
results.text:
This unit now has the following ability:

Unit Guard: This unit may guard a unit that is being attacked.

results.name: Cut The Strings
results.text: [[main]] - [[exhaust]] - 1 [[ceremonial:class]] - 1 [[basic]]: Deal 2 damage to a unit you control. If you do, you may discard a target alteration spell.

results.name: Dark Presence
results.text:
[[side]] - [[exhaust]]: Choose a target unit you control to gain the following ability for the remainder of the turn:

Terrifying 1: This unit cannot be blocked or guarded against by units with an attack value of 1 or less.

Focus 1: Then, reduce the attack value of a target unit an opponent controls by 1 for the remainder of the turn.

results.name: Dark Reaping
results.text: Destroy a unit you control to change 5 dice in your active pool to a side of your choice.

results.name: Deep Freeze
results.text:
* When attaching this spell, place 3 status tokens on this spell. Discard this spell when it no longer has any status tokens on it. As long as this spell is attached to this unit, this unit is considered to be exhausted. This unit now has the following ability:

* Thaw: [[side]]: Remove 1 status token from a Deep Freeze alteration spell attached to this unit.

results.name: Devotion
results.text:
This spell can only be attached to a unit you control. When attaching this spell, remove 1 exhaustion token from this unit.

This unit now has the following abilities:

Alert: Do not place exhaustion tokens on this unit as a result of its countering.

Rooted: This unit cannot attack.

results.name: Dispel
results.text: Remove 2 status tokens from a target card or choose a target alteration spell. If that alteration spell is a conjured alteration spell, return it to its owner's conjuration pile. Otherwise, shuffle it into its owner's draw pile.

results.name: Drain Vitality
results.text:
[[main]] - [[exhaust]] - 1 [[ceremonial:class]]: Deal 1 damage to a target unit. If you do, remove 1 wound token from a target unit.

[[side]] - [[exhaust]] - 1 [[sympathy:class]]: Remove 1 status token from a target unit. If you do, place 1 status token on a target unit.

results.name: Dread Wraith
results.text: * Rage 1: Add 1 to this unit's attack value for each wound token on this unit.

results.name: Earthquake
results.text: Deal 4 damage to a target unit and 1 damage to each other unit.

results.name: Echo Greystorm
results.text: Gravity Flux: [[side]] - [[exhaust]]: Place 1 exhaustion token on a target unit. At the end of this turn, remove that same exhaustion token.

results.name: Emberoot Lizard
results.text: Ignite: When this unit is declared as an attacker, if it has 1 or more status tokens on it, add 1 to its attack value for the remainder of the turn. If you do, you may deal 1 damage to another target unit.

results.name: Emperor Lion
results.text: Decree: When this unit comes into play, search your draw pile. You may reveal a ready spell with "Law" in its title and place it into your hand.  You may immediately play a "Law" from your hand without paying any [[main]] or [[side]] costs. Shuffle your draw pile.

results.name: Empower
results.text:
[[main]] - [[exhaust]] - 1 [[natural:class]] or 1 [[sympathy:class]]: Place 1 status token on a target unit you control.

Focus 1: Then, you may remove any number of status tokens from a unit you control. Deal damage to a target unit equal to the number of status tokens removed.

results.name: Enchanted Violinist
results.text: Song of Sorrow: [[side]] - [[exhaust]]: Deal 1 damage to a target unit an opponent controls. If that destroys the unit, after it is destroyed, that target opponent must discard 1 card off the top of their draw pile.

results.name: Encore
results.text: Search your discard pile for a card other than Encore and place it on the top or bottom of your draw pile. Draw 1 card.

results.name: Enhanced Strength
results.text:
* This unit now has the following ability:

* Endurance: Remove all exhaustion tokens from this unit at the end of each round.

results.name: Enlightenment
results.text: Remove 1 exhaustion token from a target card.

results.name: Essence Druid
results.text:
Spell Recall: When this unit comes into play, you may search your discard pile for a ready spell and place it into your hand.

Tame 2: While this unit is in battle, the attack value of units in battle with it is reduced by 2.

results.name: Exhortation
results.text: Choose 2 units you control. For each unit, add the other unit's current attack value to its attack value for the remainder of this turn.

results.name: Expand Energy
results.text: Draw until you have 2 cards in your hand.

results.name: Explosive Growth
results.text:
When attaching this spell, place 2 status tokens on this unit. Discard all other copies of Explosive Growth attached to this unit.

X = the number of status tokens on this unit.

results.name: Fade Away
results.text: Destroy this unit at the end of the round. If the destroyed unit was an ally, remove it from the game.

results.name: Fallen
results.text: Infectious: Damage dealt by this unit by attacking or countering cannot be prevented.

results.name: False Demon
results.text: Nightmare 1: When this unit comes into play, you may deal 1 damage to a target exhausted unit.

results.name: Fate Reflection
results.text: You may play this spell after a unit you control is dealt damage by a spell, ability, or dice power an opponent controls. Prevent that damage from being received, and then deal an equal amount of damage to a target unit that opponent controls.

results.name: Fear
results.text: Destroy a unit you control. If you do, remove wound tokens from your Phoenixborn equal to the destroyed unit's recover value and then discard a target unit an opponent controls.

results.name: Fester
results.text: Destroy a target unit with 1 or more wound tokens on it.

results.name: Fighting Spirit
results.text:
After a unit you control with 1 or more status tokens on it is destroyed, place 1 status token on this spell.

[[side]] - [[exhaust]]: Add X to the attack value of a target unit you control for the remainder of the turn. Then, move 1 status token from this spell onto that unit.

X = the number of status tokens on this spell.

results.name: Figures In The Fog
results.text: You may play this spell after an opponent declares attackers. Choose a target attacking unit and place 1 exhaustion token on it. It is no longer attacking.

results.name: Final Cry
results.text: You may play this spell after a unit you control is destroyed. Deal 2 damage to a target Phoenixborn.

results.name: Fiona Mercywind
results.text: Ingenuity: [[side]] - [[exhaust]] - 1 [[discard]]: Draw 1 card or remove 1 exhaustion token from a ready spell you control.

results.name: Fire Archer
results.text: Ambush 1: When this unit comes into play, you may deal 1 damage to a target Phoenixborn.

results.name: Flash Archer
results.text: Double Shot: [[side]] - [[exhaust]]: Deal 1 damage to a target unit. Then you may deal 1 damage to a target unit.

results.name: Flash Strike
results.text:
You may play this spell after an opponent has the choice to declare blockers or a guard. Choose a unit you control with 1 or more status tokens on it. For the remainder of the turn, add 2 to its attack value and it gains the following ability:

Quick Strike: While this unit is attacking, it deals its damage before units in battle with it.

results.name: Flock Shepherd
results.text:
Gather 2: After an opponent declares attackers, you may add 2 to the attack value of all units you control with a printed attack value of 0 for the remainder of the turn.

Protect: Units you control with a printed attack value of 0 cannot be targeted by spells, abilities, or dice powers an opponent controls.

results.name: Flute Mage
results.text: Enliven: [[side]] - [[exhaust]]: Remove 1 exhaustion token from a target unit.

results.name: Foresight
results.text:
During the draw cards step, you may draw 1 additional card.

[[main]] - [[exhaust]]: Look at the top 2 cards of a target player's draw pile. Place 1 of those cards on the bottom of that draw pile, and the place the other card on the top of that draw pile.

results.name: Freezing Blast
results.text: Deal 2 damage to a target unit. Remove 2 status tokens from that unit.

results.name: Frostback Bear
results.text: Terrifying 1: This unit cannot be blocked or guarded against by units with an attack value of 1 or less.

results.name: Frost Bite
results.text:
[[main]] - [[exhaust]] - 1 [[natural:class]]: Deal 1 damage to a target unit or Phoenixborn.

Focus 1: You may change the activation cost of this ability to [[main]] - [[exhaust]] - 1 [[basic]].

results.name: Frost Fang
results.text: * Armored 1: After this unit is dealt damage, prevent 1 damage from being received.

results.name: Gates Thrown Open
results.text: Remove 1 exhaustion token from 1 ready spell in each of your spellboard slots.

results.name: Generosity
results.text:
Resolve one of the effects listed below. Choose a target opponent to resolve a different effect of their choice. Then, resolve the last unchosen effect.

- Remove 1 exhaustion token from your Phoenixborn or a ready spell you control.

- Remove 2 wound tokens from your Phoenixborn or a unit you control.

- Draw 3 cards.

results.name: Gilder
results.text:
Unit Guard: This unit may guard a unit that is being attacked.

* Inheritance 1: When this unit is destroyed, you may place 1 status token on a target unit.

results.name: Glow Finch
results.text:
Unit Guard: This unit may guard a unit that is being attacked.

Last Request 2: When this unit is destroyed, you may choose a target player to discard 2 cards off the top of their draw pile.

results.name: Golden Veil
results.text: You may play this spell after an opponent targets a unit you control with a spell, ability, or dice power. Cancel that effect and the remaining effects of that spell, ability or dice power.

results.name: Gorrenrock Brawler
results.text:
* Brawl 1: After a unit is destroyed, if this unit had been declared as an attacker, blocker, or guard this turn, place 1 status token on this unit.

* Comeback: [[main]] - 1 [[basic]]: If there are 6 or more tokens of any type on this unit, remove all tokens from this unit.

results.text:
Threatening: This unit must be blocked, if able.

results.text: [[main]] or [[side]] - [[exhaust]] - 1 [[divine:class]] or 1 [[sympathy:class]]: Attach an [[Enhanced Strength]] conjured alteration spell to a target exhausted unit you control.

results.text:
After 1 or more wound tokens are placed on your Phoenixborn as a result of a unit's attack, place 1 status token on this spell if it has no status tokens on it.

results.text: Hex 2: When this unit comes into play, you may lower 2 dice in a target opponent's active pool one level.

results.text: Magic Armor: This unit cannot be targeted by spells an opponent controls.

When this unit receives damage, place twice the normal number of wound tokens on it.

While this unit is the target of an attack, no guard may be declared.

results.name: Hunting Weapons
results.text:
This spell can only be attached to an ally.

results.text:
Call the Hunt: When this unit comes into play, place 2 status tokens on this unit and place a [[Panther Spirit]] conjuration onto your battlefield.

Guide: [[side]]: Remove 1 status token from this unit to add 1 to the attack value of another target unit you control for the remainder of the turn.

results.name: Hypnotize

results.text: You may play this spell after a unit with a life value of 2 or less comes into play. Destroy that target unit.

results.text: Convene With Souls: [[side]] - [[exhaust]]: Search your draw pile for an ally, reveal it, and place it into your hand. Place a number of wound tokens equal to that ally's life value on this card. Shuffle your draw pile.

results.text: Prepare: [[side]] - [[exhaust]] - 1 [[time:class]]: Search your draw pile for 1 card and set it aside. Shuffle your draw pile, then place the set aside card on top of it.

results.text: Place 1 exhaustion token on each unexhausted unit.

results.name: Koji Wolfcub
results.text: Accelerate Growth: [[side]] - [[exhaust]]: Place 1 status token on a target card.

results.name: Law of Assurance
results.text:
When this spell comes into play, change all dice in your active pool to their class side.

Players may not re-roll or change the level of dice in an opponent's active pool.

* Bound: This card cannot be discarded from your spellboard when you Meditate.

* Fleeting: Discard this card at the end of this round.

results.name: Law Of Domination
results.text:
When this spell comes into play, choose an opponent to choose a unit they control. Then, choose a unit you control. Those units deal damage to each other equal to their attack value.

This damage, and damage from attacking or countering, cannot be prevented.

* Bound: This card cannot be discarded from your spellboard when you Meditate.

* Fleeting: Discard this card at the end of this round.

results.name: Law of Fear
results.text:
When this spell comes into play, you may place 1 exhaustion token on a target unit with an attack value of 0.

While in battle, the attack value of all attacking units is reduced by 1.

* Bound: This card cannot be discarded from your spellboard when you Meditate.

* Fleeting: Discard this card at the end of this round.

results.name: Law Of Grace
results.text:
When this spell comes into play, remove 1 wound token from your Phoenixborn.

After any Phoenixborn is dealt damage by a spell or ability, prevent 1 damage from being received.

* Bound: This card cannot be discarded from your spellboard when you Meditate.

* Fleeting: Discard this card at the end of this round.

results.name: Law of Sight
results.text:
When this spell comes into play, you may draw up to 2 cards. No player may play reaction spells.

* Bound: This card cannot be discarded from your spellboard when you Meditate.

* Fleeting: Discard this card at the end of this round.

results.text: Quick Strike: While this unit is attacking, it deals its damage before units in battle with it.

results.text: Pain Link 1: [[side]]: Move 1 wound token from this unit onto a target Phoenixborn.

results.name: Lulu Firststone

results.name: Luminous Seedling
results.text:
Blossom: [[main]]: Remove 2 status tokens from this unit and destroy this unit. If you do, place up to 2 [[Brilliant Thorn]] conjurations onto your battlefield.

* Growth: Add 1 to this unit's life value for each status token on this unit.

results.name: Maeoni Viper

results.name: Magic Syphon
results.text: [[side]] - [[exhaust]]: Change 1 die in your active pool to a side of your choice. Change 1 die in a target player's active pool to a side of your choice.

results.name: Majestic Titan
results.text:
Gigantic 1: This unit cannot be blocked or guarded against by units with a life value of 1 or less.

* Renew: [[main]] - 1 [[basic]]: Discard a copy of Summon Majestic Titan from your spellboard to remove all exhaustion tokens and discard all alteration spells from this unit.

results.name: Mark Of The Goddess
results.text: Choose a target unexhausted unit an opponent controls. Deal damage equal to the chosen unit's attack value to another target unit that opponent controls. If the chosen unit is the only unexhausted unit that opponent controls, you may deal that damage to their target Phoenixborn instead.

results.name: Mass Heal
results.text: Remove 1 wound token from all units. If you have a divine die on its class or power side in your active pool, you may instead remove 1 wound token from your Phoenixborn and all units you control.

results.name: Massive Growth
results.text:
* This spell can only be attached to a unit with an attack value of 2 or less.

* Spell Guard: This spell cannot be affected by an opponent's spell.

* Fleeting: Discard this card at the end of this round.

results.name: Master Vampire
results.text:
Stalk: This unit cannot be guarded against.

Life Drain 1: After this unit destroys a unit an opponent controls by attacking, you may remove 1 wound token from your Phoenixborn.

results.name: Memorialize
results.text:
After an ally you control is destroyed, place 1 status token on this spell if it has no status tokens on it.

[[side]] - [[exhaust]]: Remove 1 status token from this spell to search your discard pile for a spell and place that spell on the bottom of your draw pile.

results.name: Memory Theft
results.text: [[main]] - [[exhaust]] - 1 [[charm:class]]: Look at a target player's hand. That player may discard 1 card of your choice from that hand. If they do not or cannot, place 1 wound token on their Phoenixborn.

results.name: Meteor
results.text: Deal 1 damage to all units. Then, deal damage to all units equal to the number of [[divine:power]] spent to play this spell.

results.name: Mind Fog Owl
results.text: Unseen: This unit cannot be blocked unless all attacking units without the Unseen ability have been blocked.

results.name: Mind Maze
results.text:
* This unit cannot attack, block, or guard.

* Escape: [[main]] - [[side]] - 1 [[basic]] - 1 [[discard]]: Discard this card.

* Lost: Discard this unit at the end of the round.

results.name: Mind Probe
results.text: Choose a target opponent to reveal the top 5 cards of their draw pile. Choose 1 of those revealed cards and remove it from the game. Return the rest of the revealed cards to the top of that opponent's draw pile in the order of your choice.

results.name: Mirror Spirit
results.text:
Reflect Sorrow: When this unit comes into play, place 1 status token on this unit for each exhaustion token on units a target player controls.

* X = the number of status tokens on this unit.

results.text: Deal 1 damage to all opponent's units. You may draw 1 card.

results.text: Place 3 wound tokens on a target unit or Phoenixborn.

results.name: Nature's Wrath
results.text: Deal 1 damage to all units.

results.name: New Ideas
results.text: Choose 1 card in your hand and place it on the bottom of your draw pile. If you do, draw 3 cards.

results.name: Nightmare Mount
results.text:
Terrifying 1: This unit cannot be blocked or guarded against by units with an attack value of 1 or less.

* Dismount: When this unit is destroyed, place any allies you own underneath this unit into your hand.

results.text: Pacify 1: When this unit is destroyed, you may place 1 exhaustion token on a target unit.

results.text:
Polyphony: When this unit is destroyed, change 1 die in a target player's active pool to a side of your choice.

Renewed Harmony: When this unit is destroyed, you and a target opponent each choose a card in the other's discard pile. Place the chosen cards into their owner's hand.

results.name: Noah Redmoon

Forwarn 2: When this unit comes into play, you may look at the top 2 cards of a target opponent's draw pile. Place each card on the top or bottom of that player's draw pile.

Hasten: When this unit is declared as an attacker, if it has 1 or more status tokens on it, you may remove 1 exhaustion token from a ready spell you control.

results.name: One Hundred Blades
results.text: Deal 1 damage to a target Phoenixborn. Deal 1 damage to all opponents' units. Draw 1 card.

Deal X amount of damage to a target unit. You may draw 1 card.

X = the number of units you have in play.

results.text:
[[main]] - [[exhaust]] - 1 [[charm:class]]: Choose a target player to discard 1 card off the top of their draw pile.

results.name: Resonance
results.text:
When this spell comes into play, select 2 dice in your exhausted pool and place them into your active pool on a side of your choice.

When you play this spell, place it face up under a ready spell on your spellboard. While this card is on your spellboard, all other cards in its spellboard slot are focused one additional time.

results.name: Resummon
results.text: [[main]] - [[exhaust]] - 1 [[ceremonial:class]] - 1 [[illusion:class]]: Destroy a conjuration you control. Then, place that conjuration onto your battlefield.

results.name: Return to Soil

results.text: Search your discard pile for up to 3 allies and shuffle them into your draw pile.

results.name: Rile the Meek

You may deal 1 damage to a target unit an opponent controls.

Focus 1: You may deal 1 damage to a target unit.

Focus 2: Then you may deal 1 damage to a target unit.

results.name: Summon Shadow Spirit
results.text: [[main]] - [[exhaust]] - 1 [[illusion:power]]: Place a [[Shadow Spirit]] conjuration onto your battlefield.

results.name: Summon Shining Hydra
results.text: Place a [[Shining Hydra]] conjuration onto your battlefield.

results.name: Summon Silver Snake
results.text:
[[main]] - [[exhaust]] - 1 [[charm:power]] - 1 [[natural:power]]: Place a [[Silver Snake]] conjuration onto your battlefield.

Focus 1: Place 1 status token on that Silver Snake.

Focus 2: Place 1 additional status token on that Silver Snake.

* Spell Guard: This spell cannot be affected by an opponent's spell.

results.name: Summon Sleeping Widows
results.text: You may play this spell after a unit you control is destroyed. Place 2 [[Sleeping Widow]] conjurations onto your battlefield.

results.name: Summon Spectral Assassin
results.text: Choose a target ally you control and place it into its owner's hand. If you do, place a [[Spectral Assassin]] conjuration onto your battlefield. You may draw 1 card.

results.name: Summon Squall Stallion
results.text: [[main]] - [[exhaust]] - 1 [[sympathy:class]] - 1 [[basic]]: Draw 1 card. Place a [[Squall Stallion]] conjuration onto your battlefield.

results.name: Summon Steadfast Guardian
results.text:
[[main]] - [[exhaust]] - 1 [[charm:class]] - 1 [[divine:class]]: Place a [[Steadfast Guardian]] conjuration onto your battlefield.

Focus 1: You may remove all wound tokens and exhaustion tokens from a target Steadfast Guardian you control.

results.name: Summon Three-Eyed Owl
results.text: [[main]] - [[exhaust]] - 1 [[charm:class]]: Place a [[Three-Eyed Owl]] conjuration onto your battlefield.

results.name: Summon Time Hopper
results.text:
[[side]] - [[exhaust]] - 1 [[time:class]]: Place a [[Time Hopper]] conjuration onto your battlefield.

Focus 1: Then, if you control an unexhausted Time Hopper with 1 or more status tokens on it, you may place an additional [[Time Hopper]] conjuration onto your battlefield.

results.name: Summon Turtle Guard
results.text:
[[main]] - [[side]] - [[exhaust]] - 1 [[time:power]]: You may place a [[Turtle Guard]] conjuration onto your battlefield.

Focus 1: If you do not, you may place 1 exhaustion token on an unexhausted Turtle Guard you control to place 1 exhaustion token on a target unexhausted unit an opponent controls.

results.name: Summon Vampire Bat Swarm
results.text: [[main]] - [[exhaust]] - 1 [[ceremonial:class]] - 1 [[sympathy:class]]: Place a [[Vampire Bat Swarm]] conjuration onto your battlefield.

results.name: Summon Weeping Spirit
results.text:
[[main]] - [[exhaust]] - 1 [[charm:class]]: Place a [[Weeping Spirit]] conjuration onto a target player's battlefield.

Focus 1: You may search a target discard pile for 1 card and remove it from the game.

results.name: Summon Winged Lioness
results.text: [[main]] - [[exhaust]] - 1 [[divine:class]] - 1 [[basic]]: Place a [[Winged Lioness]] conjuration onto your battlefield.

results.name: Sunshield Sentry
results.text:
Deflect: When this unit is declared as a blocker, you may choose a target unblocked attacking unit. That unit is no longer attacking.

Alert: Do not place exhaustion tokens on this unit as a result of its countering.

results.name: Sun Sister
results.text: Care 1: [[side]]: Remove 1 wound token from another target unit you control.

results.name: Survival of the Fittest
results.text: Destroy all units with no tokens on them and no alteration spells attached to them.

results.name: Swift Messenger
results.text:
~ Swift: After a unit comes into play onto an opponent's battlefield, you may play this unit from your hand without paying its main action cost.

Assist 1: When this unit comes into play, draw 1 card.

results.name: Sword of Virtue
results.text: Destroy a target unit or remove all wound tokens and exhaustion tokens from a target unit.

results.name: Sympathy Pain
results.text: You may play this spell after 1 or more wound tokens are placed on your Phoenixborn as a result of an attack, spell, ability, or dice power an opponent controls. Deal 2 damage to a target unit or Phoenixborn that opponent controls.

results.name: Temple Elder
results.text:
* Resourceful 1: When this unit comes into play, place 1 status token on this unit. At the beginning of the player turns phase, place 1 status token on this unit.

Wisdom 1: [[side]] - 1 [[sympathy:class]]: Remove 1 status token from this unit. If you do, draw 1 card.

results.name: The Awakened State
results.text:
* [[side]]: Remove 1 status token from your Phoenixborn. If you do, choose an opponent. Deal 1 damage to a target unit they control. Deal 1 damage to their target Phoenixborn.

* Spell Guard: This spell cannot be affected by an opponent's spell.

results.text: Memory Drain 1: [[main]] - [[exhaust]]: Choose a target player to discard 1 card of their choice from their hand.

results.name: Time Hopper

Gift 1: When this unit comes into play, you may place 1 status token on another target unit.

Fearful: This unit cannot block.

results.name: To Shadows
results.text: Discard a target exhausted unit.

results.name: Transfer
results.text: Move 1 token from a target player's non-Phoenixborn card onto another non-Phoenixborn card that player controls.

results.name: Transmute Magic
results.text: Swap any number of dice in your exhausted pool with an equal number of dice in your active pool, placing them each on a side of your choice. Change 1 die in each target player's active pool to a side of your choice.

results.name: Turtle Guard
results.text:
Rooted: This unit cannot attack.

Unit Guard: This unit may guard a unit that is being attacked.

* Withdraw: While this unit is exhausted, prevent all damage dealt to this unit from being received.

results.name: Undying Heart
results.text:
This unit now has the following ability:

* Undying: When this unit is destroyed, if it is an ally, you may place it into its owner's hand.

results.name: Vampire Bat Swarm
results.text:
Group Tactics 1: After you declare three or more attackers, you may add 1 to this unit's attack value for the remainder of the turn.

Swarm: When this unit is destroyed, you may spend 1 [[ceremonial:class]] or 1 [[sympathy:class]] to place this unit onto your battlefield.

results.name: Vanish
results.text: You may play this spell after an opponent targets you or your Phoenixborn with a spell, ability, or dice power. Cancel that effect and the remaining effects of that spell, ability, or dice power.

results.name: Vengeance
results.text: Destroy X units you control. If you do, add 1 to the attack value of X target units you control for the remainder of the turn.
